passages.text:
Oh, I’m sorry for appear again with bad news. It seems like if I’m only here to announce the evil.
[[Just a little]]
[[You helps me a lot with that]]

links.name: You helps me a lot with that
links.link: You helps me a lot with that

passages.name: Neeko?

passages.text:
I’m sorry, I’ll try my best to talk about better things, okay?
[[Shure]]
passages.name: Just a little

passages.text:
Oh, thanks for being comprehensive, I’ll try my best to talk about interesting things, okay?
[[Shure]]
passages.name: You helps me a lot with that

passages.text:
So… hmm…. What should we talk about?… eh…
[[Are you okay?]]
[[Do you want me to help?]]

links.name: Do you want me to help?
links.link: Do you want me to help?

passages.name: Shure

passages.text:
Ah, yes yes. It’s just…. Hmmm… 
I have to think in something…. Think, think, think….
[[...]]
passages.name: Are you okay?

passages.text:
Oh, no, no, no. It’s just…. Hmmm… 
I just have to think in something…. Think, think, think….
[[...]]
passages.name: Do you want me to help?

passages.text:
AH I KNOW!
[[Whoa, so, about what we’re going to talk?]]

links.name: Whoa, so, about what we’re going to talk?
links.link: Whoa, so, about what we’re going to talk?

passages.name: Whoa, so, about what we’re going to talk?

passages.text:
Yeah! Like… I mean…. it’s getting cold right?
[[I don’t know….]]
[[I guess… so?->I don’t know….]]
passages.name: Wheater….?

passages.text:
Ahhhhh I’m so terrible at talking to people.
Like, before you loss you memories, you where my only friend and the only one that I could talk. But now… I don’t know.. it’s different.
[[I’m sorry...]]
[[Can I do anything to help you?->I’m sorry...]]

links.name: Can I do anything to help you?

passages.name: I don’t know….

passages.text:
Don’t worry, that person that I used to talk don’t exists anymore. Even if the Professor somehow put all of you memories back, it still doesn’t being the same, at least it is what I think.
[[...->.2]]
passages.name: I’m sorry...

passages.text:
But hey! Don’t be depressive, I thought of something to talk about. 
The current challenge have so much darkness that you can easily be  swallowed by it.
[[But, seems like the light attract more enemies.]]

links.name: But, seems like the light attract more enemies.
links.link: But, seems like the light attract more enemies.

passages.text:
I know that, the moths are my grater weakness.
They follow the light and try to consume it, until there is no source.
[[And what I do?]]
passages.name: But, seems like the light attract more enemies.

passages.text:
Against them… You have to fight without my help.
But there are bugs that fear the radiance more than anything.
Please, use my light to help you this hour.
[[I will try…]]
passages.name: And what I do?

passages.text:
Just believe in yourself the same way that I believe in you… 
[[Thanks for your help]]
passages.name: I will try…

passages.text:
Hihi, thank you for being so kind with me.
[[You are an amazing person...->You are amazing...]]
[[You are amazing...]]
passages.name: Thanks for your help

passages.text:
light dbuw wjqtn yzz zox wqmom
[[Light... what?->END]]
passages.name: You are amazing...

passages.name: END
